card.name: Venser, the Sojourner
card.property: +2: Exile target permanent you own. Return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step. −1: Creatures can't be blocked this turn. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, exile target permanent."

card.name: Whitemane Lion
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Whitemane Lion enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

card.name: Augury Owl
card.property: Flying When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Coral Fighters
card.property: Whenever Coral Fighters attacks and isn't blocked, look at the top card of defending player's library. You may put that card on the bottom of that player's library.

card.name: Minamo Sightbender
card.property: {X}, {T}: Target creature with power X or less can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Woven from threads of the spirit world, the mistcloak rendered its wearer invisible, but quickly fell to tatters.

card.name: Mistmeadow Witch

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Olka collected the evening mist for years, studying its secrets. Once she learned its essence, she could vanish with a thought.

card.name: Scroll Thief
card.property: Whenever Scroll Thief deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: I've learned how to disable wards, pick locks, and decode the Agaran language—all before even reading the scroll!

card.name: Neurok Invisimancer
card.property: Neurok Invisimancer can't be blocked. When Neurok Invisimancer enters the battlefield, target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They won't see your shadow or hear your breath, but they will feel your blade."

card.name: Slith Strider
card.property: Whenever Slith Strider becomes blocked, draw a card. Whenever Slith Strider deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A slith's form and function are determined by the color of the sun under which it's born.

card.name: Sky Spirit
card.property: Flying, first strike

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Like a strain of music: easy to remember but impossible to catch." —Mirri of the Weatherlight

card.name: Wall of Denial
card.property: Defender, flying Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It provides what every discerning mage requires—time to think.

card.name: Galepowder Mage
card.property: Flying Whenever Galepowder Mage attacks, exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Kor Cartographer
card.property: When Kor Cartographer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Plains card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kor have no concept of exploration. They return to homelands forgotten.

card.name: Clone
card.property: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.

card.name: Cryptic Annelid
card.property: When Cryptic Annelid enters the battlefield, scry 1, then scry 2, then scry 3. (To scry X, look at the top X cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Primal Plasma
card.property: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

card.name: Sawtooth Loon
card.property: Flying When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, return a white or blue creature you control to its owner's hand. When Sawtooth Loon enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Cache Raiders
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What the current doesn't take, they do.

card.name: Windreaver
card.property: Flying {W}: Windreaver gains vigilance until end of turn. {W}: Windreaver gets +0/+1 until end of turn. {U}: Switch Windreaver's power and toughness until end of turn. {U}: Return Windreaver to its owner's hand.

card.name: Jedit's Dragoons
card.property: Vigilance When Jedit's Dragoons enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After Efrava was destroyed, the cat warriors scattered across Dominaria. Those who followed Jedit's example were strong enough to survive the ravages of apocalypse.

card.name: Sunblast Angel
card.property: Flying When Sunblast Angel enters the battlefield, destroy all tapped creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There may exist powers even greater than Phyrexia.

card.name: Sphinx of Uthuun
card.property: Flying When Sphinx of Uthuun enters the battlefield, reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.property: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle their library.

card.name: Preordain
card.property: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

card.name: Sigil of Sleep
card.property: Enchant creature Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a player, return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arrows are only one way to remove an enemy.

card.name: Revoke Existence
card.property: Exile target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "No half measures, no regrets. We'll tell no stories of this day. It will be as if it never existed at all." —Ganedor, loxodon mystic

card.name: Angelic Shield
card.property: Creatures you control get +0/+1. Sacrifice Angelic Shield: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If only an angel's wings could shelter us all." —Barrin, master wizard

card.name: Oblivion Ring
card.property: When Oblivion Ring enters the battlefield, exile another target nonland permanent. When Oblivion Ring leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

card.name: Safe Passage
card.property: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and creatures you control this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one flap of her wings, the angel beat back the fires of war.

card.name: Steel of the Godhead
card.property: Enchant creature As long as enchanted creature is white, it gets +1/+1 and has lifelink. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.) As long as enchanted creature is blue, it gets +1/+1 and can't be blocked.

card.name: Vanish into Memory
card.property: Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

card.name: Overrule
card.property: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. You gain X life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With one commanding word, the spell was put down and a fine collected for its casting.

card.name: Azorius Chancery
card.property: Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped. When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {W}{U}.

card.name: Flood Plain
card.property: Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped. {T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: New Benalia
card.property: New Benalia enters the battlefield tapped. When New Benalia enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) {T}: Add {W}.

card.name: Sejiri Refuge
card.property: Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield tapped. When Sejiri Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life. {T}: Add {W} or {U}.

card.name: Soaring Seacliff
card.property: Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield tapped. When Soaring Seacliff enters the battlefield, target creature gains flying until end of turn. {T}: Add {U}.

card.name: Koth of the Hammer
card.property: +1: Untap target Mountain. It becomes a 4/4 red Elemental creature until end of turn. It's still a land. −2: Add {R} for each Mountain you control. −5: You get an emblem with "Mountains you control have '{T}: This land deals 1 damage to any target.'"

card.name: Plated Geopede
card.property: First strike Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Plated Geopede gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It prefers a cooked meal, so it will eat you now and lava-bask later.

card.name: Pygmy Pyrosaur
card.property: Pygmy Pyrosaur can't block. {R}: Pygmy Pyrosaur gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Do not judge a lizard by its size. —Ghitu proverb

card.name: Pilgrim's Eye
card.property: Flying When Pilgrim's Eye enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The kor send their thopter kites to see if the land is in a welcoming mood.

card.name: Aether Membrane
card.property: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Aether Membrane blocks a creature, return that creature to its owner's hand at end of combat.

card.name: Fiery Hellhound
card.property: {R}: Fiery Hellhound gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I had hoped to instill in it the loyalty of a guard dog, but with fire's power comes its unpredictability." —Maggath, Sardian elementalist

card.name: Vulshok Sorcerer
card.property: Haste {T}: Vulshok Sorcerer deals 1 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Vulshok sorcerers train by leaping into electrified storm clouds. Dead or alive, they come back down with smiles on their faces.

card.name: Anger
card.property: Haste As long as Anger is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain, creatures you control have haste.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Molten earth has no anger of its own. Only by infusing it with your own rage can the magma seethe and take shape." —Koth of the Hammer

card.name: Cosi's Ravager
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you may have Cosi's Ravager deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Cosi has many followers. Even the volcano finds a way to do his bidding." —Zakken, Enclave cleric

card.name: Vulshok Berserker
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He experiences every emotion with passion and repays every slight with vengeance.

card.name: Bloodfire Kavu
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Kavu: It deals 2 damage to each creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Heart of fire, blood of lava, teeth of stone.

card.name: Stone Giant
card.property: {T}: Target creature you control with toughness less than Stone Giant's power gains flying until end of turn. Destroy that creature at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A typical day for a giant. A momentous event for a goat.

card.name: Geyser Glider
card.property: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Geyser Glider gains flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Quit pontificating, mage. The last thing we want to do is give it more hot air." —Tala Vertan, Makindi shieldmate

card.name: Lithophage
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Lithophage unless you sacrifice a Mountain.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's viciously territorial, destroying every creature on the mountain it has chosen to consume.

card.name: Torchling
card.property: {R}: Untap Torchling. {R}: Target creature blocks Torchling this turn if able. {R}: Change the target of target spell that targets only Torchling. {1}: Torchling gets +1/-1 until end of turn. {1}: Torchling gets -1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Chartooth Cougar
card.property: {R}: Chartooth Cougar gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Mountaincycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Mountain card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Earth Servant
card.property: Earth Servant gets +0/+1 for each Mountain you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Fire. Air. Water. These elements spread, filling in the spaces they are not. But earth is implacable like a sullen child." —Jestus Dreya, Of Elements and Eternity

card.name: Greater Stone Spirit
card.property: Greater Stone Spirit can't be blocked by creatures with flying. {2}{R}: Until end of turn, target creature gets +0/+2 and gains "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Having charted their way up the difficult face, the two mountaineers had to contend with the mountain's decision to stand up.

card.name: Bloodfire Colossus
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Bloodfire Colossus: It deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It took all its strength to contain the fire within.

card.name: Wayfarer's Bauble
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is the forest beyond the horizon, the mountain waiting to be climbed, the new land across the endless sea.

card.name: Armillary Sphere
card.property: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

card.name: Journeyer's Kite
card.property: {3}, {T}: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "From the clouds, you can see as far as the distant horizon. It's a reminder of the infinite possibilities of everyday life." —Noboru, master kitemaker

card.name: Vulshok Morningstar
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Searing Blaze
card.property: Searing Blaze deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. Landfall — If you had a land enter the battlefield under your control this turn, Searing Blaze deals 3 damage to that player or planeswalker and 3 damage to that creature instead.

card.name: Vulshok Battlegear
card.property: Equipped creature gets +3/+3. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Downhill Charge
card.property: You may sacrifice a Mountain rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Seismic Strike
card.property: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you." —Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

card.name: Spire Barrage
card.property: Spire Barrage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

card.name: Jaws of Stone
card.property: Jaws of Stone deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of targets, where X is the number of Mountains you control as you cast this spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When giants find their mountain homes infested, they have a whole range of solutions.

card.name: Volley of Boulders
card.property: Volley of Boulders deals 6 damage divided as you choose among any number of targets. Flashback {R}{R}{R}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
